oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil Defense Tent at the Fair, Nashville, Tennessee, 1955
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Civil Defense tent at the Nashville Fair with the Boy Scouts and young children in line to receive their Civil Defense ID tags. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
